channel.title: How can i add picture to client background?
channel.description: how can i make this pic http://s570.photobucket.com/albums/ss144/Bloopynerd/?action=view&current=clientpic.jpg to my client background? when i try it says sorry an error has occured 1.try closing all open webbrowsers 2.try clearing your web browsers cache from tools 3. try using a different game world 4. try rebooting your computer 5.try selecting a different type of java

item.title: How can i add picture to client background?
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

You normally get that error if your environment variables arnt set, or there is a problem from editing somthing from the “media” side of the client, I belive.

Read full topic

item.source: How can i add picture to client background?

item.title: How can i add picture to client background?
item.dc:creator: @pus pus
item.description:
@pus wrote:

[quote=“duffy12345678910, post:5, topic:306016”][quote author=pus link=topic=402211.msg2980972#msg2980972 date=1254605453]
This is how .

1.Save the picture to your desktop
2.Open your client
3.Find the background so is there already
4.Find the picture you saved to your desktop
5.Open it with paint
6.Click on “File” then “Save as” then “name.jpg”
7.Copy the picture and paste it in the client and rename it to the same as the old so are there and compile.

This should work.
[/quote]
thanks for help dude[/quote]

No problem

Read full topic

item.title: How can i add picture to client background?
item.dc:creator: @mich702703 mich702703
item.description:
@mich702703 wrote:

this is bether:

1.download the background
2.get into ur sprites(of ur client…duh) and look for ur curent back ground …it should call “javaownz”
3.open thad javaownz and copy ur new background over it.(make sure it is hight ect… and not 2 different numbers els ur client cant load it
3.save it and run ur client
4.(if needed compile ur client)

this wors for mine idk abouth urs…

item.title: How can i add picture to client background?
item.dc:creator: @pus pus
item.description:
@pus wrote:

This is how .

1.Save the picture to your desktop
2.Open your client
3.Find the background so is there already
4.Find the picture you saved to your desktop
5.Open it with paint
6.Click on “File” then “Save as” then “name.jpg”
7.Copy the picture and paste it in the client and rename it to the same as the old so are there and compile.

This should work.

item.title: How can i add picture to client background?
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

Go into your client folder, find the .PNG picture, put yours there instead and overwite it with the same name, compile, run. BINGO!
